meanings.sent1: The farmer accidentally stepped on a cowflop in the field.
meanings.sent2: Watch out for cowflops while walking in the pasture.
meanings.sent3: The children found a cowflop and thought it was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The cowflop lay in the grass like a brown pancake.
meanings.sent5: The sun baked the cowflop, releasing a pungent odor.

meanings.sent1: Be careful not to cowflop when crossing the meadow.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally cowflopped while wearing my favorite shoes.
meanings.sent3: She laughed as her friend cowflopped into the mud.
meanings.sent4: The hiker cowflopped right into a pile of cow dung.
meanings.sent5: The clumsy dog cowflopped all over the clean kitchen floor.

meanings.sent1: The air was thick with the stench of cowflop.
meanings.sent2: The barnyard was filled with the familiar scent of cowflop.
meanings.sent3: The chef wrinkled his nose at the aroma of cowflop in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The wind carried the odor of cowflop across the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The room reeked of fresh cowflop, making everyone gag.
